biotools.summary:
CYCLeR is a software package for assembly of circRNA transcripts from
RNA-seq data. Takes a set of BSJ prediction files and RNA-seq BAM files as an input
and outputs circRNA trascnripts as FASTA, GTF and flat annotation files. The tools
also outputs a padded FASTA to serve as an index for transcript EM abundance estimation.

bioschemas.name: CYCLeR
